title: Vigils mark Syria anniversary
description: A number of vigils have been held around the world to mark the second anniversary of the conflict in Syria.
content:
A number of vigils have been held around the world to mark the second anniversary of the conflict in Syria.

In Amman in Jordan, children gathered in front of the Citadel for an event organised by Save the Children.

One of the protesters, Laura Aghabi, said the children of Syria didn't deserve to die or get hurt.
